about_the_game:
"Too Late Forest" is a belt-scrolling adventure game in which a boy navigates his way through a mysterious forest.
The game has multiple endings, with the ending branching out when the boy turns back from the forest, where it will be too late if he enters.

The deeper the protagonist goes into the forest, the more his body gradually transforms into a beast.
It's up to you to turn back before it's too late for the boy, turn back in your preferred form, or keep going...

Can you lead the boy to "happiness"?

【Number of endings】

Approximately 10

【1play】

approx. 5 seconds to 4 minutes

【Total play time】

approx. 20-30 minutes

【Things to note when playing】

This game is controlled with a keyboard and mouse.
If a gamepad or other device is connected, the keyboard may not respond.
If the game character does not move, please unplug the gamepad and restart the game.

【About streaming and video posting】

welcome.
Regardless of whether you are a company or an individual, you are free to stream or post live playthrough videos without needing to obtain permission.
It is okay to earn revenue by streaming and posting videos of this game.
However, please include the title of this game(Only "Too Late Forest" is OK) in the title of your stream/video, and the URL of this store page in the description.
(※Additional Note: It is prohibited to post the EX that is unlocked after collecting all the endings online, but it is okay to broadcast or post the video with the relevant part hidden on the screen.)

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of domestic violence, bloody scenes, suicide, and other content that may be disturbing.

detailed_description:
"Too Late Forest" is a belt-scrolling adventure game in which a boy navigates his way through a mysterious forest.
The game has multiple endings, with the ending branching out when the boy turns back from the forest, where it will be too late if he enters.

The deeper the protagonist goes into the forest, the more his body gradually transforms into a beast.
It's up to you to turn back before it's too late for the boy, turn back in your preferred form, or keep going...

Can you lead the boy to "happiness"?

Approximately 10

【1play】

approx. 5 seconds to 4 minutes

【Things to note when playing】

This game is controlled with a keyboard and mouse.
If a gamepad or other device is connected, the keyboard may not respond.
If the game character does not move, please unplug the gamepad and restart the game.

name: TOO LATE FOREST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: "Too Late Forest" is a belt-scrolling adventure game in which a boy navigates his way through a mysterious forest. The deeper the boy goes into the forest, the more his body gradually transforms into a beast, and by turning back at any time, the ending will branch out.Can you lead him to happiness?
